patterns_discovered: Comprehensive edge case testing for JSON parsing
Handling of malformed and complex JSON structures
Extensive unicode and emoji handling in parsing
Graceful error handling with empty returns
Flexible parsing of sender hash arrays
gotchas_discovered: Empty sender arrays should be skipped
Mixed type sender arrays require type conversion
Null values in JSON parsing must be handled gracefully
Complex multi-codepoint emojis need special handling
recommendations: Consider extracting common test setup logic
Add performance benchmarks for parsing large reaction sets
Document the exact parsing rules for parseReactionsFromField16()
Consider property-based testing for more randomized inputs
